message.body: What was the name of the eco village u went to? Dancing rabbit?
Nevermind. This one is in MO
It was called Dascha. It was Russian.
elf the musical is playing here at Christmas!
I bet tickets are crazy
But that would be fun.
That would be fun!!
Whats hunters last name?
Nevermind.. I "googled him". Hahahah
Is he coming for thanksgiving or ilianas play?
Elf tickets are $102 each
Sunday dec 8th 3pm
He's not coming for thanksgiving. Trying to see if we can drive down that Sunday. What the date for her play?
If you can't, I understand... I don't want you to be stressed over it
How much is the ticket round trip
I am really going to try. If I can't drive with H, it will be really hard to afford another bus ticket two weekends in a row. He hasn't said he can yet because of work.
Probably like 50 but I would have to coordinate a pick up and drop off same day.
In DC
Well keep me posted, im sure we will record it, so if you can't make it then i'll bring it during xmas
K
So driving would be so much easier
Okay. I will ask him again tonight and if he's working, I won't be able to make it :( I'll text you tonight. Have to teach now!
